text: "Love Me More" is a song by British singer Sam Smith. It was released on April 28, 2022. The song was announced on April 20, 2022. It is from Smith's fourth studio album, Gloria. The song has received positive reviews from critics. Tom√°s Mier of Rolling Stone described the song as a "melancholic track" that "turns into a self-empowering anthem". Rania Aniftos of Billboard called the song "empowering" and felt that Smith's "honeyed vocals ring through the pensive chorus". ==References== Category:2022 songs Category:Sam Smith songs
